name: Not a Dungeon
description:
Our hero was in a dungeon from which he will have to get out. To get out you need to find the right door, to open the door you need to find the key, but to find the key, our hero has to go through the bodies. dozens of bodies of his enemies. Zealots or cult followers, or “I don’t know who they are,” strive to finish off our hero, therefore there is only one rule - to be careful and prudent (suddenly there is a secret passage somewhere behind the wall). How to find the right door? Well, how. Have to run around.

Controls:

  • Press X: - shoot
  • Press Z: - hide / use door
  • Press F: - fullscreen
  • Press ESC: - pause
  • Press ALT + F4: - exit
